_comment1: IP address of the MQTT broker.
_comment5: Mode of the fleet management. Options: SIMULATED_AGENTS or REAL_AGENTS.
_comment6: Run time in seconds. Value can be set high for 'infinite' run time.
_comment7: Diameter of the circle the agent requires to rotate around its kinematic center point in meters.
_comment8: Maximum waiting time for a node reservation before the error flag of the agent is set in seconds.
_comment9: Time for loading and unloading of the agents at the stations in seconds.
